column1: Enabled Preview mode. In this case recommendation boxes are only visible if there is a special ?gr_reco_test=true parameter in the url. E.g.: http://example.com/example-product.html?gr_reco_test=true
column2: Enabled Preview mode. In this case recommendation boxes are only visible if there is a special ?gr_reco_test=true parameter in the url. E.g.: http://example.com/example-product.html?gr_reco_test=true

column1: API user name in Gravity system.
column2: API user name in Gravity system.

column1: General display setting. If YES all boxes will use Gravity template.
column2: General display setting. If YES all boxes will use Gravity template.

column1: Path where catalog export file will be saved. Example: "gravity_reco/" (path must be writeable)
column2: Path where catalog export file will be saved. Example: "gravity_reco/" (path must be writeable)

column1: Enable all products to export. Otherwise please select NO and set the maximum number. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.
column2: Enable all products to export. Otherwise please select NO and set the maximum number. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.

column1: The maximum number of products to be exported. This number must be between 1 and 1000.
column2: The maximum number of products to be exported. This number must be between 1 and 1000.

column1: Select additional attributes for catalog export.
column2: Select additional attributes for catalog export.

column1: In this case only those products will be exported which quantity higher than zero(is in stock). If your store doesn't use stock management choose YES.
column2: In this case only those products will be exported which quantity higher than zero(is in stock). If your store doesn't use stock management choose YES.

column1: Enable scheduled export job bby cron. Note: you must configure your server to run cron jobs.
column2: Enable scheduled export job bby cron. Note: you must configure your server to run cron jobs.

column1: Daily start time for automatic catalog export via cron job.

column1: This will export product catalog and save in xml file. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.

column1: Enable all customer to export. Otherwise please select NO and set the maximum number. Note: there can be performance impact during this operation.
